See you this summer

For iOS For Android

Mission

Eugo is the first local bike sharing startup founded in Sweden, summer 2018. We are exploring smart and clean mobility solutions, while bringing you convenience and enjoyment.

Traffic does not necessariy mean emissions and congestions. Let's go biking, go healthy and go green.

How to Eugo

  • Simple sign up
  • Find vehicles nearby and get to it
  • Scan QR code to unlock, stay safe and enjoy your ride

Stay safe & ride cool

Always helmet
Ride on bicycle lane
Obey traffic rules
We prefer bike parking areas
Report problems when occured
